CustomField.description: User ID generated by Shipmate as part of the Shipmate Preference creation processes. Note: the User ID does not have to be stored encrypted. This field shares the same value as the "User ID" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User ID generated by Shipmate as part of the Shipmate Preference creation processes. Note: the User ID does not have to be stored encrypted. This field shares the same value as the "User ID" field.
CustomField.label: User ID (encrypted)
